articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Lao President
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Message from Lao President
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, Tuesday received a message of greeting from Choummaly Sayasone, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.
					 The message said:
					
					 I, on behalf of the C.C., the Lao People's Revolutionary Party and the government and people of Laos and on my own behalf, extend warm congratulations and greetings to you and, through you, to the WPK, the DPRK government and all the fraternal Korean people on the occasion of the 66th anniversary of the DPRK. 
					
					 I am greatly satisfied with the fact that diligent, heroic and fraternal Korean people have made great successes in the noble work to build the DPRK into the state with the powerful and modern defense capability and science and technology and improve the people's living standard for the 66 years under the outstanding leadership of the WPK.
					
					 I am convinced that the DPRK would grow steadily strong and prosperous despite all difficulties, turns and twists as long as there is your outstanding and tested leadership.
					
					 I am pleased that good and traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the Lao People's Democratic Republic and the DPRK are growing stronger day by day in conformity with the interests of the peoples of the two countries and regional and global peace, stability and cooperation.
					
					 Availing myself of this auspicious opportunity, I wish you good health, happiness and fresh greater victory in carrying out the noble cause to defend and build the country and achieve the peaceful reunification of Korea. 
					
					 Please accept my high regards.

articles.title: Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Lao President
articles.content:
Floral Basket to Kim Jong Un from Lao President 
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a floral basket from Choummaly Sayasone, president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic and general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party, with the approach of the 66th anniversary of the founding of the DPRK. 
					 Kiettisak Keobanhdith, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, conveyed the floral basket to an official concerned on Wednesday.

articles.title: Message to President of European Council
articles.content:
Message to President of European Council
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Donald Tusk on his election as president of the European Council at the EU summit.
					 The message wished the president successes in his future work, expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and the EU would grow stronger in various fields in the future.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Greets High Representative-Elect of European Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Greets High Representative-Elect of European Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong Tuesday sent a message of greeting to Federica Mogherini upon her election as high representative of the European Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy at the recent EU summit.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and the EU would grow stronger in various fields in the future, wishing her success in her work.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Greets Syrian PM
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Greets Syrian PM
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Pak Pong Ju, premier of the DPRK Cabinet, on August 31 sent a message of greeting to Wael Nader Al Halqi upon his reappointment as prime minister of the Syrian Arab Republic.
					 The message wished the prime minister and government of Syria bigger successes in the work for smashing all moves of the hostile forces, defending the sovereignty and security of the country and stabilizing the people's life.
					
					 DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a message of greeting to Walid Al-Muallem upon his reappointment as deputy prime minister and concurrently minister of Foreign Affairs and Expatriates on the same day.

articles.title: 2nd Conference of Architects Union of Korea Held
articles.content:
2nd Conference of Architects Union of Korea Held 
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The Second Conference of the Architects Union of Korea took place at the Central Youth Hall on Wednesday. 
					 Present there were O Su Yong, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Choe Yong Gon, vice-premier of the Cabinet, officials concerned and delegates chosen at provincial conferences. 
					
					 The conference decided as agenda items "On the review of the work of the C.C., Architects Union of Korea", "On the amendment of rules of the Architects Union of Korea" and "On the election of the guiding organ of the C.C., Architects Union of Korea".
					
					 Sim Yong Hak, vice-chairman of the C.C., Architects Union of Korea, made a report on the first agenda item. 
					
					 The reporter recalled leader Kim Jong Il attached great importance to the role of the union in the building of a thriving nation and paid a deep attention to the work for developing the union. 
					
					 The past decade covered by the union in its history is associated with the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, another master of architecture and genius of creation and construction, he said, and went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Un learned in detail about the union's work several times and clarified the issues to be solved by the union to perform its responsibility and role as a social organization of architects and construction experts. 
					
					 The work of the union has been steadily strengthened and the role of its members been increased. As a result, the union has made a positive contribution to implementing the grandiose plan of the party for building a highly civilized socialist nation. 
					
					 All the successes are a brilliant fruition of the wise guidance of Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 All the officials and members of the union should bring about a fresh surge and innovations in creating the Juche-oriented architecture, remaining loyal to the idea and leadership of Kim Jong Un, and make a tangible contribution to winning the final victory in the drive for building a thriving nation. 
					
					 Speeches on the first agenda item were made by Pang Se Yong, section chief of the C.C., Architects Union of Korea; Ri Ki Chol, secretary general of the North Phyongan Provincial Committee of the Union; Jong Hui Chol, vice department director of the State Design Guidance Bureau; Paek Nam Hyok, rector of College of Land and Environment Protection under Pyongyang University of Architecture; and others. 
					
					 A decision on the first agenda item was adopted. 
					
					 Discussions were made on the second and third agenda items.
					
					 Amended rules of the union were adopted and the new guidance organ of the C.C., Architects Union of Korea was elected at the conference.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held at the Pyongyang Grand Theater Wednesday to mark the 40th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Art of Opera".
					 Present there were Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture, and officials, creators, artistes, teachers and researchers in the fields of arts and art education.
					
					  An Tong Chun, chairman of the C.C., the General Federation of the Unions of Art and Literature of Korea, made a report.
					
					 The reporter said that Kim Jong Il in his famous work "On the Art of Opera" published in September, Juche 63 (1974) systematized his overall idea and theories on the building of the Juche-oriented opera.
					
					 He regarded the establishment of Juche in the art of opera as the main principle to be held fast to in the opera revolution and clearly underscored the need to adhere to the principles on ensuring the party spirit, the working-class spirit and the popular spirit and properly combining the ideological value and artistry in the creation of operas and abide by the principle of speed campaign and collectivism.
					
					 The work also clarifies theoretical and practical issues arising in creating opera music and making artistic representation such as verse-song as the main means of the opera, its advantages, characteristics and role of pangchang, feature of opera orchestra and its artistic representation. 
					
					 The reporter referred to an important duty facing the field of art of opera to thoroughly carry out the tasks set forth in the letter supreme leader Kim Jong Un sent to the participants in the 9th National Meeting of Artistes. 
					
					 He called upon all creators and artistes to turn out as one in the efforts to usher in a new heyday of literature and art under the uplifted banner of creating the Korean speed, bearing in mind the noble plan and intention of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Stamp Show of Philatelists of DPRK and Russia to Be Held
articles.content:
Stamp Show of Philatelists of DPRK and Russia to Be Held
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- A stamp show of philatelists of the DPRK and Russia is to be held here from Sept. 9 to 13 under the co-sponsorship of the Korean Union of Philatelists and the Russian National Stamp Philatelists Academy to mark the 66th founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					 The show will be held at the Korean Stamp Museum.
					
					 Displayed there will be stamps collected by philatelists of the DPRK and Russia.
					
					 The show will contribute to significantly celebrating the DPRK's birthday and developing the friendship and exchange between the philatelists and people of the two countries.

articles.title: New Koryo Therapies Applied
articles.content:
New Koryo Therapies Applied
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Many hospitals in the DPRK have applied new Koryo (traditional) therapies to take greater effect in treating patients.
					 The South Hwanghae Provincial People's Hospital uses Koryo medicines in curing abdominal purulent trauma, instead of antibiotic medicine.
					
					 The Haeju City People's Hospital No. 2 introduces electropuncture to the treatment of such lumbago as slipped disk and lumbosacral neuromyositis.
					
					 The South Phyongan Provincial People's Hospital proved successful in treating illness resulting from body chill and various complications by such traditional therapies as acupuncture, moxibustion and cupping. It also uses Koryo medicines, abundant in the country, in curing haemorrhoid.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Full Play to Advantages and Might of Self-supporting Economy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Giving Full Play to Advantages and Might of Self-supporting Economy
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- It is necessary to settle the issue of economic management by Korean style in order to fully demonstrate the advantages and might of the Juche-oriented socialist self-supporting economy and win the final victory in the drive for building a thriving nation. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an editorial. 
					 The editorial goes on:
					
					 The establishment of Korean-style economic management method is, in essence, the work to apply, carry forward and develop the principle and methods of economic management indicated by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il as required by the present times. 
					
					 It is necessary to hold fast to the socialist principle in improving the economic management. 
					
					 It is essential to ensure the maximum economic profitability by guiding and managing economy according to the objective laws of economy and scientific reason. 
					
					 In order to improve the economic management it is important to raise the responsibility and role of the economy guidance institutions and officials. 
					
					 It is possible to successfully achieve economic development only by working out a scientific economy development strategy, enlisting the natural resources and all potentials of the country to the maximum, ensuring a steady growth of production and keeping the overall balance of economy. 
					
					 The Cabinet is the economy command of the country. 
					
					 It is necessary to strengthen the Cabinet responsibility system, system centering on the Cabinet, concentrate all the economic fields and overall economic work on the Cabinet and take measures under the supervision of the Cabinet. 
					
					 The editorial calls for improving the economic management as required by the developing reality and intended by the party and thus giving fuller play to the advantages of Korean-style socialism and bring about a fresh turn in the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Demands Definite End to DPRK-Targeted Joint Military Exercises
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Demands Definite End to DPRK-Targeted Joint Military Exercises 
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The DPRK-targeted joint military exercises being staged in south Korea frequently are the root cause of blocking the improvement of the inter-Korean relations and throwing a stumbling block in the way of achieving the peace and the reunification of the country, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The tension is escalating on the Korean peninsula, bringing misfortune and pain to the compatriots, far from being defused. This is attributable to the ceaseless large-scale joint military drills staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers.
					
					 It is an urgent task of the Korean nation to put an end to the political and military confrontation which brings nothing good to the national reconciliation and unity, increases the distrust and hostility between compatriots and brings the danger of a nuclear war.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group is busy talking about "dialogue" while staging ceaseless north-targeted joint military exercises but there is no one who would believe it.
					
					 The south Korean people will never allow the useless waste of money collected from them as taxes for doing harm to the compatriots and staging maneuvers for a war of aggression which may invite even a nuclear disaster.
					
					 No aggressor can ever overpower the concerted efforts of the Korean nation. Whoever truly loves the country and is concerned about the nation's destiny should turn out as one in a just and patriotic struggle to put an end to the north-targeted war drills of the warmongers at home and abroad, irrespective of ideology, political view and ism. 
					
					 It is necessary root out the very source of a war against the north running counter to the process for improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving the peace and reunification of the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Worst Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Worst Human Rights Abuser
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, a young black man was shot dead by a white policeman in Ferguson City, Missouri State, U.S. and policemen mercilessly cracked down upon protesters by leveling guns and firing tear-gas and smoke shells at them. A policeman shot another black young man to death in other city some days ago.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article observes in this regard:
					
					 The U.S. is, indeed, the worst human rights abuser as its inhabitants are subject to discrimination and contempt due to their different race and are struck with fear that when they would be shot to death.
					
					 It is the tundra of human rights. This is the comment and fair judgment by the world community.
					
					 The U.S. regards the issue of "human rights" as a lever for interfering in other countries' internal affairs and realizing hegemony.
					
					 The U.S. "annual report on human rights" is aimed at finding an excuse for interfering in internal affairs of other countries and nations.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to be concerned about its poor human rights issue before taking issue with other countries' human rights records.
					
					 The U.S. once made bluffing over the "issue of human rights." Entering this century, the prestige of the U.S. fell to the ground in the eyes of the world.
					
					 If the U.S. persistently seeks to play the role of "a human rights judge" under the signboard of "championing human rights", quite unaware of how the world community views it, it may get a serious trouble.
					
					 The U.S. had better stop wielding a human rights stick which works on no one.
					
					 The U.S. should be forced to sit in the dock of the international human rights tribunal as it is not qualified to talk about human rights.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Blocking Even Sports and Cultural Exchange
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Blocking Even Sports and Cultural Exchange
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- All Koreans are cursing and denouncing the puppet group of south Korea over its action to bar a cheerleading squad of the north from participating in the 17th Asian Games.
					 Much upset by this, the puppet group is letting loose a string of poor excuses that the story about its displeasure with the north's dispatch of its cheerleading squad is contrary to the fact and it is regretful. 
					
					 Minju Joson Wednesday observes in a commentary:
					
					 The puppet group is resorting to a sleight of hand to falsify truth, justify its despicable act of blocking even the sacred sports and cultural exchange and shift the blame for this on to the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK's decision to send the cheerleading group together with players group to the Asiad was intended to use the occasion for mending the north-south ties.
					
					 It is a publicly recognized fact that the north's cheerleading squad went to south Korea three times in the past, enlivening games and contributing to the national reconciliation and unity.
					
					 But no sooner had the above-said decision been made public than the puppet group of south Korea floated fictions about "political operative group" and "squad to spark conflict in south Korea." It made no scruple of talking rubbish that the north is playing "double-dealing tactics of reconciliation and war" and "using beauties."
					
					 Now that the puppet group has an axe to grind, displeased with the dispatch of the cheerleading squad, no one can vouch what will happen if it goes to the south.
					
					 The north was thus compelled to notify the south side that it would cancel the dispatch of the squad.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group should honestly apologize to the nation for its criminal action to prevent the cheerleading squad from taking part in the games.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Jongyojo Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Suppression of Jongyojo Slammed
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea released a statement on August 30 denouncing the puppet authorities for suppressing the Teachers Union (Jongyojo).
					 The statement recalled that on August 29 the Jongro Police Station in Seoul issued a warrant of arrest for members of Jongyojo for the mere reason that they spearheaded the campaign for publishing a declaration on the situation and the campaign for leaving school early over the ferry Sewol disaster.
					
					 This is a human rights abuse trampling down the freedom of expression and association, the people's basic right, and an indiscriminate politically-motivated suppression of Jongyojo, the statement charged.
					
					 It lashed out at the regime for working with bloodshot eyes to crack down on Jongyojo keen to conduct proper education for children.
					
					 It demanded the authorities stop the politically-motivated suppression of Jongyojo.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime's "Row about Followers of North" Assailed
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime's "Row about Followers of North" Assailed
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Voice of People, an internet paper of south Korea, in an editorial on Sept. 1 accused the puppet forces of kicking up a "row about followers of the north."
					 One year has passed since the case of the attempted rebellion occurred, stunning the world, the editorial said, adding that the people are expressing antipathy towards the Intelligence Service and the present  regime which faked up the case and abused it for their political purpose.
					
					 In a recent opinion poll an overwhelming majority of respondents expressed sympathy with the assertion that if there was no attempted rebellion, agitation for rebellion should not be regarded as a guilt, the editorial held.
					
					 As regards the final hearing on an appeal over the case of the attempted rebellion at which the court sentenced those related to the case to heavy penalties including nine years in prison, the public condemned it as a politically-motivated  trial as the court read the face of the regime, the editorial charged.
					
					 The past one year proves that truth cannot be concealed and teaches a lesson that the Intelligence Service and the security forces should not be allowed to "persist in their racket for labeling people followers of the north", it held.

articles.title: U.S. Moves to Build Missile Shield Denounced
articles.content:
U.S. Moves to Build Missile Shield Denounced
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on Tuesday in an editorial blasted the U.S. moves to build a missile shield. 
					 The editorial quoted media on Monday as saying that the U.S. made the deployment of THAAD in south Korea an established fact and finished the selection of its site. 
					
					 It noted that the U.S. deployment of THAAD in south Korea is designed to throw a worldwide missile monitoring network, to say nothing of the north, as X-band radar, its essential component, has a detecting range of 1,000 km. 
					
					 What is intolerable is the fact that the present regime is feigning ignorance of it in a bid to pull the wool over the people's eyes, the editorial noted, and went on: 
					
					 If THAAD is deployed in south Korea without the consent of the people, no one will deny the fact that south Korea is a colony of the U.S.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Russia
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was brought out in booklet by the Razo Publishing House in Artyom City, Russia on August 25.
					 The work, published on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says the 100 year-long history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to glorify the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by British Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Only Victory and Glory Are in Store for Us Who Are Advancing under the Unfurled Flag Bearing the Immortal Beaming Images of the Great Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" was posted by the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy on its website on August 21.
					 The work, published on August 25, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the Songun feats performed by leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It calls for dynamically advancing to win a final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun started and successfully led by President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Nepalese Personage
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Nepalese Personage
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics who doubles as editor-in-chief of the Nepalese paper Arpan, released an article titled "President Kim Il Sung is the eternal sun of Juche" on August 22.
					 He wrote:
					
					 There was no great man such as President Kim Il Sung in the human history.
					
					 The President is a great philosopher, politician and strategist who led the 20th century to victory with his distinguished idea, theories and wise leadership, possessed of the personality and qualifications as a great man on the highest level.
					
					 He is a legendary hero who is alive in the hearts of mankind for his great idea, exploits and noble virtues.
					
					 He regarded believing in the people as in Heaven as his maxim and devoted all his life to the Korean people and mankind.
					
					 The Korean People's Army became the army of the party and the leader, genuine people's army and revolutionary army with the political and ideological traits under his leadership.
					
					 The Korean people defeated the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world, and honorably defended the freedom and independence of the country.

articles.title: Day of Songun Observed by British Organization
articles.content:
Day of Songun Observed by British Organization
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- The Korean Friendship Association UK released a statement on August 22 to mark the Day of Songun in the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il inspected the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army on August 25, 1960, the first inspection for his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Under his Songun leadership, the KPA developed into a matchless army.
					
					 The DPRK has demonstrated its might as a fortress of the global anti-imperialist revolution, a satellite manufacturer and launcher and a nuclear weapons state. It is performing world-startling miracles in the building of an economic power every day.
					
					 Songun politics is, indeed, an effective main political mode providing a sure guarantee for the victory of socialism.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is bolstering up the defence capability of the DPRK and energetically leading the drive for building a thriving nation by successfully carrying forward the Songun revolutionary leadership of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Feats Lauded by Syrian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Revolutionary Feats Lauded by Syrian Figure
 Pyongyang, September 3 (KCNA) -- Saber Ballul, head of the Department of the Political Faculty of the University of Damascus of Syria, issued a statement on Aug. 24 on the occasion of the Day of Songun in the DPRK.
					 Aug. 25 is a significant day for the world progressives, he said, and continued:
					
					 On Aug. 25, 1960, leader Kim Jong Il provided his first field guidance for his Songun revolutionary leadership to the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su Guards 105th Tank Division of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					
					 Thanks to his Songun politics, the DPRK emerged a military power which no one dares provoke.
					
					 Such politics is the wisest political mode and a treasured sword for victory with which to defend the sovereignty of the country in the present world where the law of the jungle prevails.
					
					 He developed the KPA into the strong army equipped with modern military hardware by pursuing original Songun politics and thus decisively frustrated the hostile forces' moves to stifle the DPRK and won one victory after another.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun politics, the DPRK ranked itself among nuclear weapons states and satellite manufacturers and launchers in the world.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary feats performed by him for the Korean revolution and the peace and security of the world will last forever.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de presidente laosiano
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de presidente laosiano
Pyongyang, 3 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, recibio un mensaje de felicitacion que le enviara el dia 2 Choummaly Sayasone, secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao. 
					La misiva senala:
					
					En ocasion del 66o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, hiciera llegar a Vd. y, por su conducto, al Partido del Trabajo de Corea, al gobierno coreano y a todo el hermano pueblo coreano las calidas felicitaciones y cordial saludo en nombre del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao, el gobierno y el pueblo laosianos y en el mio propio. 
					
					Estoy muy contento de que durante 66 anos transcurridos, bajo la destacada orientacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el hermano pueblo coreano diligente y heroico haya logrado grandes exitos en su noble trabajo para construir la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea como un Estado dispuesto de poderosa y moderna capacidad de defensa nacional, ciencias y tecnicas y mejorar mas la vida del pueblo. 
					
					Estoy seguro de que gracias a la destacada y probada guia de Vd., la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea prosperara siempre, pese a las dificultades y vicisitudes de toda indole. 
					
					Me agrada el que las excelentes y tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la Republica Democratica Popular Lao y la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se fortalecen y se desarrollan cada dia mas conforme a los intereses de los pueblos de los dos paises y a la paz, la estabilidad y la colaboracion de la region y el resto del mundo. 
					
					Aprovechando esta oportunidad jubilosa, le deseo a Vd. buena salud y felicidad y mayor victoria nueva en la defensa y construccion de la patria y en el cumplimiento de la noble causa por la reunificacion pacifica de Corea. 
					
					Reciba el testimonio de mi alta consideracion.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores enviado por presidente laosiano
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe cesto de flores enviado por presidente laosiano
Pyongyang, 3 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio un cesto de flores que le enviara Choummaly Sayasone, Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao y Presidente de la Republica Democratica Popular Lao, con motivo del 66o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					El embajador lao en Corea Kiettisak Keobanhdith lo traslado el dia 3 a un funcionario coreano.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a electo presidente de Consejo Europeo
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a electo presidente de Consejo Europeo
Pyongyang, 3 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, remitio la vispera un mensaje de felicitacion a Donald Tusk, electo presidente del Consejo Europeo en la cumbre de la UE.
					El remitente expresa su conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y la UE se desarrollaran mas en el futuro en diversas esferas y desea al destinatario exitos en sus labores ulteriores.

articles.title: Cuadros visitan alojamiento de participantes en Conferencia de Funcionarios de Ensenanza
articles.content:
Cuadros visitan alojamiento de participantes en Conferencia de Funcionarios de Ensenanza
Pyongyang, 3 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Pak Pong Ju, Choe Thae Bok, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, el jefe de departamento del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Han Kwang Bok, el presidente del Comite de Educacion Kim Sung Du y otros funcionarios del Comite Central del PTC visitaron el dia 2 el alojamiento de los participantes en la XIII Conferencia Nacional de los Funcionarios de Ensenanza. 
					Ellos felicitaron a los funcionarios y profesores quienes han logrado exitos en la educacion para las generaciones venide ras bajo la bandera de la tesis de la educacion socialista.
					
					Y encomendaron a ellos que glorifiquen las imborrables proezas de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il quienes prepararon el gran programa de la revolucion docente y desarrollen mas la educacion segun la idea y el proposito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un para formar mucho los mas competentes revolucionarios que se encargaran de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista.

articles.title: Tendra lugar exhibicion de filatelia Corea-Rusia
articles.content:
Tendra lugar exhibicion de filatelia Corea-Rusia
Pyongyang, 3 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Tendra lugar en esta capital la exhibicion de filatelia Corea-Rusia con motivo del 66o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Se celebrara del dia 9 al 13 en el Museo de Sellos de Corea bajo coauspicios de la Union de Filatelistas de Corea y la Academia de Filatelistas de Sellos Nacionales de Rusia.
					
					Se expondran alli los sellos coleccionados por los filatelistas de los dos paises.
					
					La exposicion contribuira a celebrar con significacion el dia de la fundacion de la RPDC y promover la amistad e intercambio entre los aficionados a sellos y demas habitantes de ambos paises.
